member.summary: SafeHandle class for holding find handles

member.name: T:FeedBuilder.Win32.SafeNativeMethods
member.summary: Wrapper for P/Invoke methods used by FileSystemEnumerator

member.name: T:FeedBuilder.FileSystemEnumerator
member.summary: File system enumerator. This class provides an easy to use, efficient mechanism for searching a list of directories for files matching a list of file specifications. The search is done incrementally as matches are consumed, so the overhead before processing the first match is always kept to a minimum.

member.name: F:FeedBuilder.FileSystemEnumerator.m_scopes
member.summary: Stack of open scopes. This is a member (instead of a local variable) to allow Dispose to close any open find handles if the object is disposed before the enumeration is completed.

member.name: F:FeedBuilder.FileSystemEnumerator.m_paths
member.summary: Array of paths to be searched.

member.name: F:FeedBuilder.FileSystemEnumerator.m_fileSpecs
member.summary: Array of regular expressions that will detect matching files.

member.name: F:FeedBuilder.FileSystemEnumerator.m_includeSubDirs
member.summary: If true, sub-directories are searched.

member.name: M:FeedBuilder.FileSystemEnumerator.Dispose
member.summary: IDisposable.Dispose

member.name: M:FeedBuilder.FileSystemEnumerator.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Constructor.
member.param: Semicolon- or comma-delimitted list of paths to search.
Semicolon- or comma-delimitted list of wildcard filespecs to match.

member.name: M:FeedBuilder.FileSystemEnumerator.Matches
member.summary: Get an enumerator that returns all of the files that match the wildcards that are in any of the directories to be searched.
member.returns: An IEnumerable that returns all matching files one by one.
member.remarks: The enumerator that is returned finds files using a lazy algorithm that searches directories incrementally as matches are consumed.

member.name: T:FeedBuilder.FileSystemEnumerator.SearchInfo
member.summary: Information that's kept in our stack for simulated recursion

member.name: F:FeedBuilder.FileSystemEnumerator.SearchInfo.Handle
member.summary: Find handle returned by FindFirstFile

member.name: F:FeedBuilder.FileSystemEnumerator.SearchInfo.Path
member.summary: Path that was searched to yield the find handle.
